CustomField.description: New Contacts added through Profile Updates will create a Nomination that can be reviewed prior to acceptance. If unchecked, new Contacts added through Profile Updates will be immediately added as Program Members.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: New Contacts added through Profile Updates will create a Nomination that can be reviewed prior to acceptance. If unchecked, new Contacts added through Profile Updates will be immediately added as Program Members.
CustomField.label: New Contact Creates Nomination
